title: Bob Marley 1980-09 Last Rehearsal, Criteria Studios, Miami, FL
description:
Bob Marley & The Wailers
September, 1980 Criteria Studio Rehearsal, Miami, FL
Lineage: Tape One - VHS(x) > Cass(x) > Tascam 122MKIII Deck > Rane PE-15(Stereo) > CDR(0) > EAC (Secure) > FLAC Frontend (8)
	 Tape Two - VHS(Low) > Cass(Low) > Tascam 122MKIII Deck > Rane PE-15(Stereo) > CDR(0) > EAC (Secure) > FLAC Frontend (8)
Tracks: 35
Length: 
Quality: Starts of 4+/5-. Quality degrades as tape progresses, ends at 2+/3-.

Disc One:

Tape 1
1. Real Good Time
2  Tuning*			
3. All on Board^
4. Jam		       
5. Rebel Music 				
6. So Jah Seh 				
7. Exodus^				
8. Could You Be Loved?^
9. Tuning*
10. Could You Be Loved?**
11. Tuning / So Much Trouble %

Tape 2   
12. So Much Trouble^			
13. Burnin & Lootin 			
14. Zimbabwe*				
15. I Shot the Sheriff**			
16. We & Them			
17. Coming in from the Cold**		
18. Rastaman Live Up!**	
19. Tuning	
20. Jah Live*^			

Disc Two:

1. Sun is Shining**%			
2. Running Away > Crazy Baldhead* 	
3. Night Shift 				
4. Rastaman Chant^			
5. Concrete Jungle^ 			
6. Lively Up Yourself**			
7. Zimbabwe^** 				
8. Bad Card
9. Tuning				
10. Trenchtown Rock 			
11. African Herbsman 			
12. Kaya** 				
13. Want More^**			
14. Talking / Tuning
15. Slave Driver 			

^ Song cuts at the end
*Song cuts in the middle
**Song cuts at the beginning
% Cut for tape flip/switch

Notes: This rehearsal has commonly been traded as 9/14/80, but the tape probably spans at 
least 5 different rehearsal sessions. One of the best sessions around, but the quality suffers from heavy low 
end distortion, especially on disc two. Both tapes are sourced from video, tape one sounds low gen, but I don't 
have exact info. Tape two is low gen for sure - either 1st or 2nd.


issued 17-08-2013 to(marley and tosh archive's).
by sean a.k.a soul rebel
